meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unable to be answered or explained.
meanings.sent1: The unanswerabilities of the universe leave us in awe.
meanings.sent2: Scientists often encounter unanswerabilities in their research.
meanings.sent3: The unanswerabilities of a cat chasing its tail never fail to amuse me.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes held a depth of unanswerabilities that intrigued him.
meanings.sent5: The unanswerabilities of the ancient ruins whispered secrets of the past.

meanings.definition: Things that cannot be answered or explained.
meanings.sent1: Philosophers ponder the unanswerabilities of existence.
meanings.sent2: The unanswerabilities of the paranormal world fascinate many.
meanings.sent3: The unanswerabilities of a toddler's logic can be quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The unanswerabilities of love can be both frustrating and beautiful.
meanings.sent5: The unanswerabilities of dreams often linger in our minds upon waking.
